message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product.  Given its value, I think a starting price of $14,000 is fair.  What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell. I would like to propose a price of $12,000 for the product.
Thanks for your counter-offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product is worth significantly more to me than that.  Could we meet in the middle at $13,500?
I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering the value of the product to you, I believe we can reach an agreement closer to my initial proposal. I am willing to offer $13,000 for the product.
